duties_responsibilities.duty: Review, analyze, and resolve homeowner property insurance claims by completing thorough investigations and in accordance with policy provisions, applicable statutes, and laws, and maintaining all compliance requirements.
Conduct accurate coverage analysis and damage assessments to ensure prompt payment of claims in accordance with quality standards.
Resolve claims within designated monetary authority.
Conflict resolution while maintaining professionalism and business decorum.

education_certification.credential: 5+ years of experience handling Homeowner 1st Party Property claims with an insurance carrier in a Desk Role.
